alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Iowa; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 6:27AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Buchanan, Benton, western Delaware, northwestern Linn and north central Iowa Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 627 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Jesup to near La Porte City to near Traer to near Meskwaki Casino. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Jesup around 635 AM CDT. Fairbank around 640 AM CDT. Dysart around 645 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Independence, Brandon, Hazleton, Garrison, Stanley, Belle Plaine, Rowley, Mount Auburn, Vinton, Keystone, Aurora and Luzerne. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 32 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
